content: Thinking Outside the Inbox: How to Write a Media Pitch in 5 stepsIn the realm of PR outreach, you can send hundreds of media pitches and see no publications, while a few targeted outreach efforts can help you get some impressive coverage. This post will uncover the key make-or-break factors that are likely to give a boost to your media outreach efforts.General MarketingMay 15, 2023
